tags: me pausing midstep: wait a second.
summary: I was trying to remember the company name “bert’s bees” but my 6:30 AM uncaffeinated brain gave me “bertie bott’s every-flavored...
body: I was trying to remember the company name “bert’s bees” but my 6:30 AM uncaffeinated brain gave me “bertie bott’s every-flavored bees” instead, and I’m not sure if it says more about me or about the state of candied treats in the harry potter universe that it took me a solid minute to figure out why that didn’t sound quite right

reblog.comment: I was trying to remember the company name “bert’s bees” but my 6:30 AM uncaffeinated brain gave me “bertie bott’s every-flavored bees” instead, and I’m not sure if it says more about me or about the state of candied treats in the harry potter universe that it took me a solid minute to figure out why that didn’t sound quite right

summary:
A snake and a lion // Hermione Granger
Your fifth year in Hogwarts was supposed to be the best, but it turned out as miserable...
body:
A snake and a lion // Hermione Granger

Your fifth year in Hogwarts was supposed to be the best, but it turned out as miserable as always. The light bullying, the OWLs and of course, your hopeless crush on the one and only Hermione Granger.

She was smart, beautiful, you loved her honesty and sarcastic sense of humor. She seemed like a goddess to you, although you would never even try to talk to her. There were three major reasons for that:

primo: she probably was into boys anyway.

secudno: your parents would freak out realising you were in love with a mudblood.

tertio: you were in Slytherin.

You weren’t like Draco and his minions, though. You weren’t mean, disrespectful and arrogant, that’s why the rest of the house bullied you sometimes, especially during potions when they wouldn’t get dentation; Snape seemed to hate you too.

Sitting at the bottom of the class, you tried to focus on your work, ignoring malicious comments from Pansy Parkinson.

- Ohhhh, Y/L/N, I see you preparing a disgusting imitation of love potion. Who are you going to poison it with? Maybe the squirrel-teethed scarecrow in the front row? - she sent you a nasty smile while squinting her eyes.

- Leave her alone, Parkinson - you growled towards her.

- Oh, I get, she’s way out of your league. She’s ugly, that’s true, but she’s at least bearable and that can’t be said about you.

- That’s enough, Pansy - you choked on air, when Hermione stood up, towering over Pansy - I think everyone is tired of your public display of stupidity and by the way, Y/N is a very beautiful and very smart girl. You snakes should learn from her.

You flashed a small smile to the ground, your cheeks dusted with deep blush. She stood up for you in front of everyone, she called you beautiful. She acted really brave, but what else would you expect from Harry Potter’s best friend.

- I am really sorry to announce it, but I must give you dentation after classes, Miss Granger, for your unacceptable behaviour during my lesson. Now everyone calm down and continue - Snape smirked at Hermione, although she decided wisely not to prologue the discussion.

***

- Hermione, wait - you called after her, when the potions ended and everybody was climbing up the stairs leading to the dungeons.

She turned her whole body to you, as she greeted you with a warm smile.

- Hi, Y/N.

- You didn’t have to do that. You know, standing up for me and getting dentation. I guess professor McGonagall won’t be happy - you made a shy remark, causing her to chuckle.

- Well, Pansy was bullying you, I had to say something - she put her slender finger under your chin, making you look her in the eyes - I meant it, Y/N. You are beautiful, smart, kind, people shouldn’t disrespect you. And above all, people shouldn’t disrespect the girl I like.

- You-You like me? - you stammered, pinching your forearm to make sure it’s not a dream.

- I’ve liked you since a long time and it would be an honour, if you went with me to Hogsmeade sometime? - she asked quite nervous.

- I would love to - you grinned at her like crazy and kissed her cheek shyly - See you at lunch, Hermione.

- Yeah, see you.

She stood at the entrance of the dungeons, touching her cheek lightly, a happy smile creeping on her full lips.

Requested by laurels-blog.

Hope you like it, even though

me + fandoms = shitty writing

blog.name: hpfanfictalk
blog.title: HPFanficTalk
blog.description: HPFanficTalk is a forum for people to discuss Harry Potter fanfiction and fandom, with sections for other popular fandoms as well! If you're looking for fanfic recs, you can submit asks here as well, whether or not you're a member of our forums. :)

summary: A Gnome’s Top Tips for Gardening
title: A Gnome’s Top Tips for Gardening
body:
1.       Acquire a shovel

 You’re going to need it to dig burrows under the plants. The wizards have been kind enough to garden above ground for you, and now you get to garden beneath. That’s where the delicious roots are.

2.       Avoid Jarveys

Because they will eat you.

3.       Reward yourself with playtime

It’s fun to be chased by Crookshanks, but is also very distracting. Keep cats at bay until you’ve finished.

4.       Repeat this mantra:

“You are not a pest. You are a strong, independent gnome.”

5.       Rest frequently

Being a gnome is dizzying work (since wizards have a nasty habit of throwing you over the fence) so make time for naps until the world stops spinning, then just sneak back into the garden.

“You are not a pest. You are a strong, independent gnome.”

5.       Rest frequently

Being a gnome is dizzying work (since wizards have a nasty habit of throwing you over the fence) so make time for naps until the world stops spinning, then just sneak back into the garden.

we have a Discord server! join here! (15+ only please)

we track the tag 'accioshitpost' (without a dash) so if you have art or a fic based on of one of our posts, pop it in there and we'll reblog it for you! we always appreciate your creativity!

you can find our amazon wishlists here and here - if you get us anything, we'll post a picture and a thank you note!!

if you want to follow our personal blogs, here's Roxie's, here's Persephone's, and here's Jamie's

body:
Why does some of you think Rowan is the “R”?

Because according to MC’s vision. It says that “R” is “she”. And that’s impossible for male!Rowan
